EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kevin, Yes, you enroll in it now and put your contribution for 0% and then you can change it at any time once you are active. Thanks – good question! ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Kevin McCarron [mailto:projects@kevinmccarron.com] Sent: Monday, May 07, 2012 5:35 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Error in MBO Partners Online Enrollment Sara,
I can opt in to a 401k contribution at any time correct?
KevinOn Mon, May 7, 2012 at 4:51 PM, Kevin McCarron <mccarronatlanta@gmail.com <mailto:mccarronatlanta@gmail.com>> wrote:Ok thanks I will revisit that!
Kevin McCarron404.697.4470 <tel:404.697.4470> m@creativekevin On May 7, 2012, at 3:55 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Kevin, Here is what I heard back:Hi Sara, “I’m not sure how Kevin managed to proceed past the first page, but there are some areas that he hasn’t completed on here which are probably what are leading to his error on the Enrollment Review Page. For example, his address is incomplete which is in turn causing him to be unable to sign up for any of our insurances if he wanted. Could you have him log in again and complete his address information on the Personal Info Page as well as his Retirement Plan information? If he continues to get an error please let me know. “ Please try this and let me know. Thanks!Sdara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <tel:703.793.6028> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Kevin McCarron [mailto:projects@kevinmccarron.com] <tel:703.793.6028> Sent: Monday, May 07, 2012 1:58 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: mik4job@hotmail.com <mailto:mik4job@hotmail.com> Subject: Re: Error in MBO Partners Online Enrollment Yup - just tried one more time - I keep getting that error. I've gone back and checked my submitted answers and data. All seems right on this end.
Let me know if your support team can help troubleshoot this. I don't want this to hold up start dates and such.

From: Kevin McCarron [mailto:projects@kevinmccarron.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Monday, May 07, 2012 9:52 AM To: Sara Conde Cc: mik4job@hotmail.com <mailto:mik4job@hotmail.com> Subject: Error in MBO Partners Online Enrollment Sara,
Good morning - I hope you had a great weekend.
I have been trying to complete my online enrollment within the MBO Partners dashboard for the past few days. I've entered all my information for W-4, I-9, etc. - but get an error when I try to complete the enrollment.
I've attached a screenshot - it's not a very descriptive error message, but that's what I'm getting.
Can you advise how I should proceed to get this completed?
Kevin
-- Kevin McCarron Founder, Designer & Strategist
